title: Regression in develop branch: Putty not getting input focus when switching tabs
author: irsl
body_snippet:
## Expected Behavior
When the user clicks on a ConnectionWindow tab that hosts a puttyng.exe window, Putty shall receive the input focus. This is how it is working in the master branch. 

## Current Behavior
The expected behaviour has changed in the develop branch, probably unintentionally, Putty does not get the focus anymore and the user needs an additional click every time.

comments.snippet:
Any news on this? I still have the focus issue with the latest nightly (20220613).

When you use mRemoteNG with KiTTY and the window is out of focus, every output that gets send is blank when you switch focus back. Only the cursor is a the correct position. There is little that can be done to show the output. If there is a scrollbar you can scroll to show the blank region. Sometimes, after a few minutes, the characters appear.

This is very annoying.
